data.message: Proved DURO OS effectiveness with Lore V1 vs V2 comparison: V1 (instinct-driven): 25/30 (83%). V2 (OS-driven): 30/30 (100%). Key fixes: mood sentence first, CTA at flow end, strict Mondrian grid before breaks, named discord, declared rhythm motif. Proves process catches problems before they compound.
data.task: Proved DURO OS effectiveness with Lore V1 vs V2 comparison
data.outcome: V1 (instinct-driven): 25/30 (83%). V2 (OS-driven): 30/30 (100%). Key fixes: mood sentence first, CTA at flow end, strict Mondrian grid before breaks, named discord, declared rhythm motif. Proves process catches problems before they compound.
